detail_desc: Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Jumper in fine-knit, patterned cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with a lined hood. Cable-knit front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft printed jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sun hat in woven fabric with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details with patches on the inside and an adjustable elasticated waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Off-the-shoulder dress in a soft viscose weave with elastication and a flounce with broderie anglaise at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with seams just below the knees.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in lightweight twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, lined hood with elastication around the edge. Zip with a chin guard at the front, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Fleece lining.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Metal rings in various designs.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped chest pocket, diagonal front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Slip-on cotton canvas trainers with a padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and raised text along the soles. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a small stand-up collar with gathers at the front and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partly lined with satin.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, contrasting colour panels along the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double layered headband in a soft rib knit.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.
Jersey top with a print motif on the front in a narrrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a raw-edge neckline. Raw-edge, rounded hem.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in soft, marled sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in creases and a zip at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Glittery set with two metal hair clips and two hair elastics with tulle bows. Length 5 cm. Hair elastics without metal clips.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Short skirt in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with a knot detail at the front and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Sunglasses with thin metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Soft faux fur jacket with a collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, wide dress in a viscose weave with short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Knee-length coat in bouclé yarn with wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, a tie belt at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Ankle boots with covered block heels and a shaft with a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 1.5 cm, heel 9 cm.

Bomber jacket in glossy satin with sequined letters on the front, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Raglan sleeves, front pockets and ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Soft cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and press-studs, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups and a hook-and-eye fastening.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short, lightly padded parka in washed cotton twill with a collar with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a tab with a hook and loop fastener at the cuffs. Lined.
Dog jacket in woven fabric with a hood and a hole for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and a hook and loop fastening underneath. Fleece lining.
Pile jacket with a wide collar, zip down the front, discreet side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed button placket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Relaxed fit.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.

Straight-cut jacket in a lightly padded jacquard weave with a collar and press-studs down the front. Chest pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and press-studs at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Shorts in a woven cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Cardigan in a fluffy knit with a V-neck at the front and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing at the sleeve-ends and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and straight, ankle-length legs.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Fully-lined bikini. Top with embroidery and tassels at the front and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with decorative bows at the sides.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Cap sleeves and a rounded hem.

V-neck shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Relaxed fit.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and an adjustable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Short necklace in sturdy plastic chain. Adjustable length.
Fine-knit gloves in various colours.
Bell-shaped skirt in soft cotton corduroy with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
